ygData.subject: Re: Anyone playing on Cazic Thule?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve already change the password no more sharing. Once bitten twice shy. Kiasee liao.
ygData.messageBody:
I've already change the password no more sharing. Once bitten twice shy.
Kiasee liao.

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> u can always play another enchanter... im sure with your knowledge and
> already got some char to give some support to your new char... it wont
> be too difficult for u to get back to where u previously stand... n
> for goodness sake... dont share account with others lah... if u r
> still sharing... i advice u to go get ya own now... otherwise the same
> thing might happen again.... n no body can help u... Nicademous.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Sereph
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 6:46 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Anyone playing on Cazic Thule?
> Wah, say until I so "wai tah". Truth is, the father of the
> person I shared an EQ account with wipe off ALL my
> characters in Cazic, including my dear lvl 39 enchanter,
> Sabella Estasis.
>
> KNN, I went around and ask my kakis at the other establish
> servers (Fenin Fo, Veeshan etc...) and found out that I'm
> one of the highest lvl enchanter in ALL of the freaking
> servers and she has to be killed.
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Ya, Sereph USED to play in Cazic with his LVL 40
> > enchanter. Happened that
> > one day he know all other locals play in Innoruuk. He
> > wanna join us so
> > much tat he make a non-returnable path - he deleted his
> > LVL 40 enchanter
> > and create a band new gu niang bard to join us at
> > Innoruuk, we are all so
> > touched and everyone help him to regain his lvl - by
> > giving him stuffs,
> > power-training him etc. Now he is lvl 20 bard who can
> > start to kick asses
> > ard.
> >
> > Hey why are you still in Cazic??? Delete ya lvl 18 magi
> > and come to join
> > us at Innoruuk lah. There is SO MUCH fun and benefits
> > playing with all of
> > us:
> > - Free goodies. We practice family "pass-down". When
> > Garren get a thug
> > robe which he cannot used, he pass to me FOC! When I get
> > a goss robe, I
> > pass my thug robe to flyingfox. Basically we pass all the
> > goodies ard -
> > esp when we looted something which our char cant use. So
> > far I got
> > woven/das stuffs from Yiyang and Leshrec, Robes from
> > Garren, JK Skill from
> > Sereph etc etc. I also pass RTS, Skull etc ard.
> > - Easy teaming. As compare to my japanese wiz friend, who
> > is 3-4 lvl above
> > me b4 I join the local kakis teams, I lvl much more
> > faster. The 2nd time I
> > see my jap friend, I'm already 4 lvl above him! Now he
> > also join us and
> > shortly after joining us, he boost his lvl from 14 to 20
> > in a very short
> > time. PLUS the fact tat local kakis are are VERY UNITED
> > and TRUST-WORTHY -
> > we will never leave u behind when it come to life-&-death
> > situation, except
> > for YY, haha. On top of that, you will never have problem
> > getting hunting
> > party in server coz anytime you login, u see local kakis.
> > We play till as
> > late as 4am during weekdays, and till morning for weekends
> > ;)
> > - We are all under the same guild. Tat means it's very
> > easy to get in
> > touch using the guildsay command. Limited to 20 friends
> > only? NP man, use
> > guildsay and get everyone with ya fingers.
> > - So far we have all classes except SK, ranger and rogue.
> > For local kakis
> > we got 2 wiz, 1 magi, 1 enchant, 1 necro for casters.
> > - BEST OF ALL, you can borrow money from our rich man
> > Garren. He offer
> > interest free loan. Sometime u can even confuse him
> > (since he lent money
> > to so many pple) and no need to return, hahah.
> >
> > Ziltus (Master Brewer, Excellent Smith, 6th circle Wiz).
> >
> > On Sunday, 25 July, 1999 9:10 PM, Entreri
> > [SMTP:drizzt@...]
> > wrote:
> > > From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
> > >
